name: Ext_R4B_EvidenceReport_se_author
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.EvidenceReport.section.author for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents EvidenceReport.section.author from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EvidenceReport|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Who and/or what authored the section
element.definition: Identifies who is responsible for the information in this section, not necessarily who typed it in.
element.comment: `EvidenceReport.section.author` maps to R5 `EvidenceReport.section.author`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Person)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
